title: Why Effects-based Cannabis Marketing Is Mostly Smoke and Mirrors
description: Unpredictability is one of the core challenges of shopping for cannabis. It’s incredibly rare to have a completely custom, controlled experience with weed, and even tougher to duplicate it. To people who don’t already enjoy the herb, these variables can seem too great to navigate, which is why marketing has tried to…

title: You Probably Qualify for a Free (or Very Cheap) Smart Thermostat
description: There’s no such thing as a free lunch, but there is such thing as a free smart thermostat. Energy companies all over the country are offering rebates to customers that can lower the price of a smart thermostat all the way down to zero, so before you buy an EccoBee on Amazon, check whether you qualify.

title: Science Thinks It Has Found the Best Wordle Starter
description: One thing that sets Wordle apart from other games is that you face a grid with no clues whatsoever at the start. You get to make the first move, and gameplay follows from your choices. Your starting word matters—so what do you choose?

title: 12 Outdated Fashion Rules You Don't Need to Follow Anymore
description: I am a fashion-challenged person. My parents trained me to put on pants before leaving the house, but that’s pretty much where my sartorial education stopped. For most of my adult life I have wallowed in fashion confusion, unable to keep track of the rules governing when and where I was allowed to dress a certain way.

title: You Can Finally Use Snapchat on Your Computer
description: Snapchat is the rare social media app that never made the jump from mobile to desktop. Instagram has a web app, WhatsApp has a desktop app, but, until now, you always needed your phone by your side if you wanted to Snap. Starting today, though, you can pick up those conversations on your Mac or PC, whether you’re…

title: There's No Law Against Making Sausage Gravy With Italian Sausage

title: How to Get Glasses or Contacts Without a Recent Prescription

title: 12 of the Dumbest Rituals and Traditions of the British Royal Family
description: I’m Irish-American, so I should have disdain for the British monarchy from both sides of the hyphen. I had been indifferent my whole life...that is, until Queen Elizabeth II died and the incessant “the Queen is dead” coverage revealed what a bunch of fucking freaks the royal family is. Now I’m obsessed.

title: Why You Shouldn't Trust the US News 'Best Colleges' Rankings
description: The ubiquitous US News college rankings attempt to answer an inherently subjective question—“Where should I go to college?”—with hard numbers. While an admirable goal to some extent, the resulting list is anything but objective, and it certainly should not be make-or-break in your college selection process.

title: Stick a Towel in Your Dishwasher

title: The Best Way to Organize a Family Calendar
